sentences.en: A: If you also oversleep, we'll go to the next station.
sentences.cn: 如果你也睡过头, 我们就到下一战下车.

sentences.en: Did you oversleep, miss your bus?
sentences.cn: 你睡过头了, 没赶上公共汽车?

sentences.en: He enjoys watching movies and staying up late, which usually causes him to oversleep.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢看电影并看到很晚, 这样使他经常睡过头.

sentences.en: If he's very tired in the morning, he might oversleep.
sentences.cn: 如果他早上很累的话, 他可能会睡过头.

sentences.en: If you set your alarm clock, you won't oversleep.
sentences.cn: 如果你上闹钟, 你就不会睡过头了.

sentences.en: John used to oversleep. So did I.
sentences.cn: 约翰过去常常睡觉睡过头. 我也一样.

sentences.en: Leonald oversleep because of having a slight cold.
sentences.cn: 连雷德有点感冒,所以睡过了头.

sentences.en: Mr. Brown: Yes. He used to oversleep every morning.
sentences.cn: 李先生: 对.他早上总是睡过头.

sentences.en: So I can hardly relax or even oversleep.
sentences.cn: [所以我根本无法放松入睡更不用说睡过头了].
很抱歉我迟到了，我睡过头了。

sentences.en: Why are you so late? Did you oversleep again?
sentences.cn: 怎么又晚了? 是不是又睡过头了?

sentences.en: Yes. He used to oversleep every morning.

trans.tran_cn: (过去式 overslept, 过去分词 overslept) 睡过头；睡得太久
trans.tran_en: to sleep for longer than you intended
